description: This image captures a lone penguin waddling along a sandy beach, with the ocean waves gently lapping at its feet. The penguin, likely a species adapted to temperate climates, is characterized by its distinctive black and white plumage and bright orange beak. The setting is serene and natural, highlighting the penguin's habitat outside of the icy regions typically associated with these birds.
poem:
There once was a penguin at play,
Along the beach on a sunny day.
With a waddle so grand,
Across the soft sand,
In the waves, it splashed away.
